channel.title: German on Monoglot Anxiety
channel.description: Recent content in German on Monoglot Anxiety

item.title: 10 Great German Science Youtube Channels
item.description: German science videos were some of the first “real” German media that I could understand. It might sound like a tough place to start, but thanks to the overlap between English and German scienctific vocabulary, science videos can actually be a great entry into authentic German content (especially if you’re a nerd like me).

item.title: The best German Anki template ever. Probably.
item.description: After almost a year of experimentation, I’m finally satisfied enough with my German Anki template to dare to think it might be useful for others. So in the spirit of Mads Mikkelsen advertising a pretty mediocre Danish beer as “probably the best beer in the world,” I’ll say that this is “probably the best German Anki template on the internet.
